wikipedia_page.main: Jenny Evans (1954) is a British-born naturalized German jazz singer. She was also known as owner of Jenny's Place, a jazz club in Munich's Schwabing district.

link_mentions.page: Softly, as in a Morning Sunrise

response: In the 1980s, Jenny Evans operated in Belgradstraße, a well known beyond Munich jazz club under the name „Jenny’s Place“, which in 1987 (in the movie moved to Duisburg) was the "Tatort" of the crime scene thriller .
